history.text: Hi.
I'm looking for a movie to watch.
Hey
Do you know any good movies?
I recommend Toy Story, do you like animated films?

I do.  I'
ve never seen Toy Story.  Is it any good?
For its time it was very ambitious. It's a great movie for both kids and adults.
Sounds good.  Who is in it?
Tom Hanks plays Woody, a pull-string cowboy doll and Tim Allen as Buzz Lightyear, a space ranger action figure.
Don Rickles and Jim Varney are both in it play as Mr. Potato Head and a Slinky dog, respectively.
I like both of those actors.
What's the plot about?

In a world where toys are living things who pretend to be lifeless when humans are present,
a group of toys, owned by six-year-old Andy Davis, are caught off-guard when Andy's
birthday party is moved up a week, as Andy, his mother, and infant sister Molly, are
preparing to move the following week. The toys' leader and Andy's favorite toy, a pull-string
cowboy doll named Sheriff Woody, organizes the other toys, including Bo Peep the
shepherdess, Mr. Potato Head, Rex the Dinosaur, Hamm the Piggy Bank, and Slinky Dog,
into a scouting mission. Green army men, led by Sarge, spy on the party, and report the
results to the others via baby monitors. The toys are relieved when the party appears to end
with none of them having been replaced, but then Andy receives a surprise gift – an
electronic toy space ranger action figure named Buzz Lightyear, who thinks he is an actual
space ranger.
I'd like to watch it, I think.
When was it released?
As a kid I remember it being a really fun movie since it keeps changing themes throughout the movie. Rotten Tomatoes scored it a 100% and averaging 9/10 from most critics.
It was originally released in 1995.
Okay, that's a great score.  I've never seen an RT score of 100% before.
They're rare to come by, especially these days! I haven't seen the 3rd movie, but the 2nd was pretty memorable.
Did it win any awards?
It was awarded a few notable ones, but not as many as it was nominated for, unfortunately.
What is, unfortunate.
How long is it?  I'll need to block off some time in my schedule to see it.
It's unfortunate that the movie was nominated for more awards than it actually won.
How long is the movie?
The movie's length is about 1.5 hours - perfect for a time killer between daily tasks.
Yeah. I'll be able to find time to watch it tomorrow.  That sounds great.
I might have to as well, need to get caught up for the 3rd film.
Thanks.
Your welcome, I think we have a few more turns in this conversation. I'll use it to describe some of the scenes.
That's not necessary.

uid1response.feedback: I wanted to see the movie anyway, but it's a good recommendation, and it makes sense.
